recipes.name: Poached egg & avocado breakfast salad
recipes.instructions: -Poach the eggs. -Create the salads by layering the lettuce, tomatoes, cooked quinoa, avocado, and pistachios. - Add the poached eggs and top with salt/pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Cheddar and Chive Smashed Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Cut potatoes into 2 inch chunks. Place in saucepan, cover with water and stir in 2 teaspoon salt. Bring to a boil over high heat, turn down to a simmer and cook for 15 to 20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.

recipes.name: Easy Creamy Mashed Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Place potatoes in a large pot (6-quart) and cover with cold, salted water by an inch. Bring to a boil, reduce heat down to medium-low and allow to simmer until fork tender (about 15-20 minutes).
